title: Hyundai's 300kW H1 minibus, Porsche Macan Turbo driven - Top new models of the week
text:
Hyundai Australia sprinkled some N performance on its H1 and the end result is a drift-ready 300kW minibus.

Wheels24's Sean Parker got behind the wheel of the new Porsche Macan Turbo in Cape Town. Read his driving impressions to find out more about the luxury SUV.



But the biggest news this week was Volkswagen lifting the covers - and details - of the new 8th-generation Golf which will arrive in South Africa later in 2020. Read more about it here.

In case you missed it

As part of Volvo's new Recharge campaign, take a look at how its all-electric XC40 actually works through a cool video.

FIRST DRIVE | 2019 Porsche Macan Turbo

As part of Mazda's new model offensive, and a first for the brand, the automaker unveiled an all-electric MX-30 SUV at the Tokyo Motor Show earlier in October.

Staying with the Japanese brand, they've also released its new CX-8 SUV in Japan.



Click on the links below to read the full article:
description: New models launched at the Tokyo Auto Show, Hyundai's 300kW H1 N minibus. Here are the top new models launched this week.
